summary: Discussion focused on duplicate record management software (Plotty) pricing and implementation, as well as industry classification for scoring models. The team reviewed specific industry categories needed for credit scoring and discussed how to properly classify different types of trucking and vocational businesses.
decisions: Proceed with Plotty implementation despite cost
Include 6 main industry categories: over the road trucking, vocational trucking, construction, agricultural, real estate, and other
Industry classification not needed for vendors/referral partners
action_items: Laura to introduce Michael to Anu regarding Plotty
Laura to add industry classification question to steering committee agenda
Laura meeting with Ross tomorrow about resourcing
Tuesday call scheduled for project planning discussion
concerns: Current dupe catcher software is inadequate
Risk of buying software that won't be fully utilized
michael_priorities: Ensuring software purchases are fully utilized
Accurate industry classification for scoring purposes
Clear naming conventions to avoid confusion
commitments: Laura committed to fully utilizing Plotty if purchased
Michael committed to prioritizing dupe catching solution
Laura committed to meeting with Ross about resourcing
